description: Pipeline definition that reads push events from BigQuery and outputs the approval status of commits
name: commit-review-status

parameters.helpText: The token to use when authenticating with GitHub
parameters.label: GitHub Token
parameters.name: github-token

parameters.helpText: The provisioned GitHub App Installation reference
parameters.label: GitHub App Installation ID
parameters.name: github-app-installation-id

parameters.helpText: The resource name for the secret manager resource containing the GitHub App private key
parameters.label: GitHub App Private Key Resource Name
parameters.name: github-app-private-key-resource-name

parameters.helpText: The name of the push events table. The value provided must be a fully qualified BigQuery table name of the form <project>:<dataset>.<table>
parameters.label: Push Events Table
parameters.name: push-events-table

parameters.helpText: The name of the commit review status table. The value provided must be a fully qualified BigQuery table name of the form <project>:<dataset>.<table>
parameters.label: Commit Review Status Table
parameters.name: commit-review-status-table

parameters.helpText: The name of the issues table. The value provided must be a fully qualified BigQuery table name of the form <project>:<dataset>.<table>
parameters.label: Issues Table
parameters.name: issues-table
